Jeff Beck: Still on the Run

Ano: 2018

IMDb ID: tt9477000

Classificação: 7.6

Sinopse: Documentary on the life and musical evolution of Jeff Beck, one of most innovative guitarists in history. The film covers his early days, his tenure with The Yardbirds and The Jeff Beck Group, and his subsequent projects over the decades. Includes interviews with icons such as Jimmy Page, David Gilmour, Rod Stewart, Ron Wood, Slash, and Joe Perry.—ben-thayer
